argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_rpcn | |- ( C e. RR+ -> C e. CC ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( C e. RR+ /\ N e. ZZ ) -> C e. CC ) |
| 3 |  | #P_rpne0 | |- ( C e. RR+ -> C =/= 0 ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( C e. RR+ /\ N e. ZZ ) -> C =/= 0 ) |
| 5 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( C e. RR+ /\ N e. ZZ ) -> N e. ZZ ) |
| 6 | 2, 4, 5 | #P_cxpexpzd | |- ( ( C e. RR+ /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( C ^c N ) = ( C ^ N ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_3adant1 | |- ( ( B e. ( CC \ { 0 , 1 } ) /\ C e. RR+ /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( C ^c N ) = ( C ^ N ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_eqcomd | |- ( ( B e. ( CC \ { 0 , 1 } ) /\ C e. RR+ /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( C ^ N ) = ( C ^c N ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( ( B e. ( CC \ { 0 , 1 } ) /\ C e. RR+ /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( B logb ( C ^ N ) ) = ( B logb ( C ^c N ) ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_zre | |- ( N e. ZZ -> N e. RR ) |
| 11 |  | #P_relogbreexp | |- ( ( B e. ( CC \ { 0 , 1 } ) /\ C e. RR+ /\ N e. RR ) -> ( B logb ( C ^c N ) ) = ( N x. ( B logb C ) ) ) |
| 12 | 10, 11 | #P_syl3an3 | |- ( ( B e. ( CC \ { 0 , 1 } ) /\ C e. RR+ /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( B logb ( C ^c N ) ) = ( N x. ( B logb C ) ) ) |
| 13 | 9, 12 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ( B e. ( CC \ { 0 , 1 } ) /\ C e. RR+ /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( B logb ( C ^ N ) ) = ( N x. ( B logb C ) ) ) |
